title: The absolute worst part of YouMe the Magic Cat
body:
It's literally a cat with magical powers. A cat. That casts spells. More asinine than her kit and tuning, is her very artistic design and aesthetic. 

Her name is an incredibly lame pun. Yuumi (Yoo-Mee) You & Me. We get it. She attaches to people.

Whatever designer came up with Yuumi and whomever signed off on their idea instead of laughing them out of their office needs a strike on their record.

replies.body:
{{champion:64}} Lee Sin (Listen) the blind guy
{{champion:57}}  Maokai (I am Oak anagram)
{{champion:63}} Brand (Like Branding something with hot poker)

I assume you are equally disturbed by these puns?

> [{quoted}](name=Horse Grenades ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Urg3z6kB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-15T20:36:37.327+0000)
>
> {{champion:64}} Lee Sin (Listen) the blind guy
> {{champion:57}}  Maokai (I am Oak anagram)
> {{champion:63}} Brand (Like Branding something with hot poker)
> 
> I assume you are equally disturbed by these puns?

You have no idea... >:(

But even those guys are COOL. A living tree? A burning man? A guy who is blind but a hard core martial artist? 

Compare that to a literal. magical. CAT.

If someone posted a thread in C&C about a champion who is not only a magical kitten named Yummy who sits on allies' heads but is also near-permanently untargetable, they'd be laughed right out of Boards.
Well, Yuumi it's only as threatening as it looks. Joke champ makes the game a 4v5. It's honestly a top priority ban just so you don't have one on your team.
Dodge this dude any time someone picks him in ranked

When I first saw her being announced I instantly thought "oh a teemo for bot lane". Given how uninspired and boring her gameplay is, I'm only left to imagine that she was created for the purpose of selling skins because she's "cute". And let's not forget she sounds almost exactly like Zoe. Very little effort was put into this champion and it sucks because we don't get many supports a year.

> [{quoted}](name=NTrumpWeTrust,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Urg3z6kB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-05-15T21:08:06.943+0000)
>
> When I first saw her being announced I instantly thought "oh a teemo for bot lane". Given how uninspired and boring her gameplay is, I'm only left to imagine that she was created for the purpose of selling skins because she's "cute". And let's not forget she sounds almost exactly like Zoe. Very little effort was put into this champion and it sucks because we don't get many supports a year.

iirc her voice actor is the same one as nami's.

> [{quoted}](name=issh0mans,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Urg3z6kB,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-05-15T21:26:36.237+0000)
>
> iirc her voice actor is the same one as nami's.

Gross...
I didn't mean that as a technical fact, she just sounds like something we already have. I've forgotten what Nami sounds like tbh, I'll have check when I'm home haha
Think about the last handful of champs new or rework, they've all been build around some gimick. Sylas gimick being the most OP
